Japanese: これは旅のお方。⏎よいところに来たのう⏸细にモンスターが出はじめて⏎困っておるんじゃ⏸わしはこれから たねまきをするから⏎细をモンスターから守ってほしいんじゃが…⏸ひきうけてくれるか?
Google Translate: This is a traveler. ⏎You've come to a good place⏸Monsters are starting to appear in the grain ⏎You're in trouble⏸I'm going to sow seeds from now on ⏎I want you to protect the grain from monsters...⏸Will you accept it?

Japanese: ありがとう⏎じゃあまくぞ
いやか⏸いやだというのか⏸じゃあ たねまきはやめておこう
Google Translate: No, you say no? Then let's stop planting seeds.

Japanese: はやくめが出ろ⏎ほいパッパ⏸いちにちたったら⏎でるパッパ⏸今はなんじかおぼえとけっ ほい
Google Translate: Hurry up, the baby will come out ⏎ Hey daddy ⏸ When the first day comes ⏎ The daddy will come out ⏸ Try to remember what it is now Hoi

Japanese: 今日はいいてんきじゃな⏸……ん?⏸とくに変わった事はないぞい
Google Translate: I'm not doing well today⏸...huh?⏸ Nothing special happened.

Japanese: たいへんじゃ モンスターがあらわれた⏸はやくたいじしてくれないと⏎はたけが… は、はたけがっ!⏸おくの方にいる⏎さがしてくれ!
Google Translate: It's a big deal! A monster has appeared⏸If you don't take care of it quickly⏎It's Hatake... Ha, Hatake!⏸It's on the other side⏎Look for it!

Japanese: よくやってくれた⏎ケガはなかったかい?⏸これでわしのグランドファームも⏎よい実りをむかえるじゃろう
Google Translate: You did a good job⏎Were you injured?⏸Now my grand farm will also be fruitful⏎

Japanese: わしの细がダメになってしもうた⏸守ってくれると言ったではないか……
Google Translate: My grains are ruined ⏸ Didn't you say you would protect me?

Japanese: よくやってくれた⏎いつもありがとうよ⏸おかげで作物もほうさくじゃ!⏸おれいに これをあげよう
Google Translate: You did a great job ⏎ Thank you as always ⏸ Thanks to you, the crops are healthy! ⏸ I'll give this to you.

Japanese: 『#f8ffハイビスカス#fcff』を#f7ff10#fcffこ手に入れた!!
いやぁ いろいろと助かった⏎ホントに助かった⏸また今度もたのむよ
Google Translate: Well, it helped me in many ways⏎It really helped me⏸I'll ask for it again next time

Japanese: ワールドマップにもどりますか?
Google Translate: Do you want to return to the world map?
